price: 58. Hubaal waa Allaah Irsaaqaha, Rabbiga iska leh Awoodda sare, Xoogga Badan.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
